p: The ligand parameters were constructed with the aid of the Antechamber module, using the General Amber Force Field (GAFF) [ 65]. The calculations to determine the atomic charges of the ligand were performed according to the restrained electrostatic potential (RESP) protocol using basis set Hartreeâ€“Fock level might with the functional 6-31G* [ 66]. To measure the protonation status of the amino acid residues of the receptors, the results obtained from the PROPKA program were used [ 67, 68].
